danata pawathina palana balaya thawaduratath thahawuru karaganime baladharinge athi "widiye wirodhaya" sha්ri lankawa thula yahapalanaya athikaramin saba pa්rajathantha්rawadaya sthapitha kirima sandaha, siyalu kshetha්rawala pa්rathisanskarana wenasak athikirima wenuwen siwil sanwidhana samuhikaya wisin idiripathkara athi yojana pilibandawa mahajanathawa danuwath kirimatath owunge sahaya labaganimatath "wiyaruwata erehiwa - jiwithaya wenuwen" yana themawa osse "widiye wirodhaya" mayen rata pura wadasatahan malawak salasum kara athayi rayit tu layif manawa himikam sanwidhanaye widhayaka lekam pilip disanayaka ayithiyata pa්rakasha kaleya.
